org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.kp02

Class KP02

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractControllableAlgorithm
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditableAlgorithm
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.AbstractTranslator<QPTL,FSA>
            • org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.kp02.KP02
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ControllableAlgorithm, EditableAlgorithm, Translator<QPTL,FSA>

    public class KP02
extends AbstractTranslator<QPTL,FSA>
    This class provides an implementation of the translation from a QPTL formula to a congruent Büchi automaton in [Yonit Kesten, Amir Pnueli: Complete Proof System for QPTL. Journal of Logic and Computation 12(5): 701-745 (2002)].
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String NAME
      The name of this translation.
      static java.lang.String O_CONGRUENT
      The option of returning congruent automaton instead of equivalent automaton.
      static java.lang.String O_SIMPLIFY_FORMULA
      The option of simplifying formula before translation.
      static java.lang.String O_SIMPLIFY_INTERMEDIATE_NBW
      The option of simplifying intermediate NBW.
      static java.lang.String O_SIMPLIFY_NBW
      The option of simplifying the final NBW.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FSA applyAtomic(Proposition now, Proposition f)
      Returns a Büchi automaton that is congruent to an atomic proposition.
      static FSA applyFalse()
      Returns a Büchi automaton that is congruent to false.
      static FSA applyNext(Proposition now, FSA aut)
      Returns a Büchi automaton that is congruent to () f where f is congruent to a specified Büchi automaton.
      static FSA applyOnce(Proposition now, FSA aut)
      Returns a Büchi automaton that is congruent to <-> f where f is congruent to a specified Büchi automaton.
      static FSA applyOr(FSA aut1, FSA aut2)
      Returns a Büchi automaton that is congruent to the disjunction of two specified Büchi automaton.
      static FSA applyPrevious(Proposition now, FSA aut)
      Returns a Büchi automaton that is congruent to (-) f where f is congruent to a specified Büchi automaton.
      static FSA applySometime(Proposition now, FSA aut)
      Returns a Büchi automaton that is congruent to <> f where f is congruent to a specified Büchi automaton.
      static FSA applyTrue(Proposition now)
      Returns a Büchi automaton that is congruent to true.

      Returns an equivalent automaton from a congruent automaton.
